query.name: campaignObjective
query.description: Your campaign objective helps determine your bidding strategy - Traffic objective helps you to increase the number of clicks to your store, while sales objective helps to increase your storeâ€™s sales.1:Traffic;2:Sales.

query.name: campaignType
query.description: Unlock different ways to bids, select products, and keywords with campaign types.

query.name: bizCode
query.description: Decided to choose which advertisement solution.SD:sponsoredSearch.

query.name: itemQuery
query.description: The word you do not want to put in the result.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/sponsor/solutions/keyword/searchKeyword')
request.add_api_parameter("campaignObjective", "2")
request.add_api_parameter("campaignType", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("bizCode", "sponsoredSearch")
request.add_api_parameter("itemQuery", "-")
request.add_api_parameter("itemId", "123")
request.add_api_parameter("searchWord", "shirt")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/sponsor/solutions/keyword/searchKeyword')
request.add_api_param('campaignObjective', '2')
request.add_api_param('campaignType', '1')
request.add_api_param('bizCode', 'sponsoredSearch')
request.add_api_param('itemQuery', '-')
request.add_api_param('itemId', '123')
request.add_api_param('searchWord', 'shirt')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: success
schema.description: System result for this api call.

schema.name: analyseTraceId
schema.description: If the api call failed, you could find us with this.

schema.name: errorMsg
schema.description: If the api call failed, this field will show the detail reason.
